Text: As far as I know chapter 19 has not aired yet....
But since it's you, I'll download and check it out anyway.

Erenath, the US is a bit behind the broadcasts in Canada and with the 3-week break NBC is taking they are going to fall even further behind. When ep 19 is on in the US ep 21 will be on in Canada. Ep 20 will be on in Canada on 9 June and in the US on 23 June.
